subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Bob Baffert, the trainer of the Triple Crown contender American Pharoah, said he was aware of the looming pressure but was trying to take it all in stride.
snippet: Bob Baffert, the trainer of the Triple Crown contender American Pharoah, said he was aware of the looming pressure but was trying to take it all in stride.
